settings.name: BuyOrderList
settings.select: a.[TradeOrderID], A.CorpID, a.[TradeOrderCode], dbo.f_Getcodename('备件采购类型',a.TradeType) TradeType, a.[PlanTime], a.[OrderMan], a.TotalAmount, a.[InputTime], a.[InputName], a.[AuditName], a.[AuditTime], a.[BillState], case a.BillState when 0 then '未审' when 1 then '已审' WHEN 2 THEN '已发货' ELSE '已入库' end BillStateName, a.[Remark], a.IsIn

settings.name: partsSaleDetail
settings.select: S.SerialID, S.SellOrderCode, S.SparePartCode, S.Price, S.Quantity, S.Amount, S.Remark, S.UpdatePerson, S.UpdateDate, B.SparePartName, B.SpellAb, B.Unit, B.Spec
settings.from: P_SellOrderDetail S INNER JOIN B_SparePart B on S.SparePartCode = B.SparePartCode

settings.name: carStockList
settings.from: A_AutoStorage a INNER JOIN B_AutoArchives b ON A.VIN=B.VIN LEFT JOIN base_Stock C ON A.StockID=C.StockID

settings.name: StockInList
settings.select: a.StockInID, a.StockInCode, dbo.f_Getcodename('备件入库类别',a.TradeType) TradeTypeName, TradeType, a.OriType, a.OriCode, a.[InTime], a.[StockID], b.StockName, a.[CorpManager], a.[TotalAmount], a.[InputTime], a.[InputName], a.[AuditName], a.[AuditTime], a.[Remark], a.[BillState], case a.BillState when 0 then '未审' when 1 then '已审' else '' end BillStateName
settings.from: P_StockInHead AS a LEFT JOIN Base_Stock AS b ON a.StockID = b.StockID
